required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: An Investigational Study of SHR3680 in Participants With Mild to Moderate Liver Impairment and Healthy Participants
clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-center, Non-randomized, Open-label, Parallel Controlled Pharmacokinetic Study of SHR3680 in Participants With Mild to Moderate Liver Impairment and Healthy Participants

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to investigate SHR3680 in participants with different levels of liver function

primary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration time curve from time zero to time t
Area under the concentration time curve extrapolated to infinity
